thread.title: Margot Robbie Is Unrecognizable as Scandalous '90s Ice Skater Tonya Harding
thread.title_full: Margot Robbie Is Unrecognizable as Scandalous '90s Ice Skater Tonya Harding

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Margot Robbie Is Unrecognizable as Scandalous '90s Ice Skater Tonya Harding
text:
Margot Robbie as Tonya Harding Picture Margot Robbie Is Unrecognizable as Scandalous '90s Ice Skater Tonya Harding January 17, 2017 by Maggie Pehanick 83 Shares 
Margot Robbie has been spotted on the set of her upcoming movie, I, Tonya , and we have to admit: her costume is not what we expected. She's playing infamous gold medal-winning ice skater Tonya Harding, who was banned from the Olympics in 1994 for her involvement in the attack on her competitor, Nancy Kerrigan. While Harding admittedly has a different body shape than Robbie, I somehow don't remember her being this muscular in the shoulders. You can compare the image to the actual skater by checking out this footage from the 1994 Olympics: 
Yes, she's skating to the music from Jurassic Park , because it was 1994. 
Sebastian Stan is playing Harding's ex-husband, Jeff Gillooly, who accepted a plea bargain for testifying against his former wife. Let's hope we get pictures of him soon! The movie is scheduled to open in 2018. Image Source: FameFly / AKM / GSI
